switched to freemium model with some pro features only for subscribers

improved performance

long repeat calculations can now be aborted

simplified sets, now they generate only one value per loop iteration

panels are no longer highlighted in Focus mode

added sRGB P3 conversion

added Value Name node to set value names in lists

fixed various node bugs

small UI improvements
